product_name: Topeak MTX Office Bag Rack Trunk
long_description: The Topeak MTX Office Bag carries a 17 in. laptop on the back of your bike. MTX Office Bag easily and conveniently slides onto any Topeak MTX QuickTrack(TM) rack system, sold separately. Features 1 divided main compartment; laptop compartment is padded for shock resistance. Compression molded foam and coated polyester material is durable and weather resistant. Reflective detailing increases visibility in low light. Includes carry handle and removable shoulder strap.
short_description: The Topeak MTX Office Bag carries a 17 in. laptop on the back of your bike.
